title: Font Finder widget
content:
Has anyone tried TypeIndex.org’s [Font Finder widget](http://web.archive.org/web/20071124184711/http:/typeindex.org/widget.php)? More importantly, has anyone kept it in their Dashboard? If their database was much more complete (more fonts), would this single-function widget with a search field be valuable to any graphic designers here? It seems like it would be more useful if it included functions like their [Font Associator](http://web.archive.org/web/20071124184711/http:/www.typeindex.org/search_associator.php), but maybe that’s overkill for a mini-app?
